website_summaries.verdict: It has a built-in thermostat and controls. This hydronic heater stays cool to the touch.
pros: This heater is safe around children and pets
It starts and stops without the excessive popping or pinging common to other baseboard heaters
The fanless heat warms the room evenly and comfortably
It won’t circulate dust and allergens
cons: The controls, which are hidden on the bottom, may sometimes stick and be hard to turn

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Heating Option
customer_reviews.text: Works just as advertised and build quality is excellent. Easy to install if you are comfortable working with 240 volt lines. I installed in a bathroom remodel and the heater will boost the bathroom temp in a matter of minutes. It helps of course when the room is small and the heater is over-sized. Instructions are of good quality. I haven't measured energy usage, but for a small bathroom, in an old farmhouse in Maine, the costs seem very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr J.

customer_reviews.title: Good for zone heating...
customer_reviews.text: Love these heaters. Have them in every room of our 5 bedroom house. Zone heating is more efficient since we only use one bedroom and the first floor since the children have moved out. Does make an expansion sound when heating up or cooling off. Much like the noise of a radiator. Does not bother me.
customer_reviews.author: mtn granma

customer_reviews.title: rating for this product forces one to select a star which it did not earn.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered replacements of the thermostats for the heaters. The control dials were defective. The do not turn scratching numbers off and difficult to turn on and off. The second set were also defective. When I requested replacements, the company sent me a heater instead of the thermostat. This made returns deadlines expire. I had to refuse the heater at the post office and I now have to dispute the deadlines for the thermostat returns. Then hire an electrician for a third time to remove the defective ones in order to replace them. Too much nonsense for a mediocre product that I am stuck without being able to use. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: These baseboard heaters work well
customer_reviews.text: Good heaters, better than standard non hydronic baseboards. I have four over all, installed two of them several years ago. They seem to put a better heat out than the standard heaters, they are quieter, and better built and look better. The product descriptions are a little weak on these in the fact that the specs are not complete and seem to be written differently for the different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: New Baseboards
customer_reviews.text: We had old electric baseboards that is used for the back up heating system for a country house. Worked with my electrician and came up with these as a upgrade. Very happy with the new units and also upgraded the thermostats so they are programmable. Hired the electrician as I did not want to mess with 220 and was not sure the existing wiring was up to code. All good and highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: Auggie

customer_reviews.title: Quiet space heaters
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet, even heating. Great space heaters. I installed two of these in a 200 sf room that was a little far from the main forced air furnace. I prefer radiant heat to forced air and these heaters do the job very well for a low price. Considering buying again for the basement rooms. The electric bill wasn't too much higher and the gas bill went down as we could lower the thermostat in those rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Edward D. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Not much heat
customer_reviews.text: Does not heat up very much. Our little cube space heater is more effective than the combined three baseboard heaters I installed to heat our 250'ft cabin. Disappointing. Checked wiring, voltages, and spent well over an hour on the phone with product support to figure out why these things seem to produce so little heat. To no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Quiet and provides a lot of heat even at the low settings.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia M.

customer_reviews.title: It worked! Hooray!
customer_reviews.text: We really appreciated being able to buy this baseboard from Amazon to replace the one that died.
customer_reviews.author: NM Reader

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. not as efficient as i would like, but it heats nicely
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to install - I will for sure ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to install - I will for sure do this again
customer_reviews.author: Ed in Alaska

customer_reviews.title: watt?
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a long1500 watt old school unit with a 1000 hydronic unit, plenty of heat.
customer_reviews.author: R. Roman

customer_reviews.title: A great product and price
customer_reviews.text: We installed two due to room size- they keep the area comfortable - Years ago brought two- when they needed to be replaced we went back to this model-
customer_reviews.author: marilyn graham

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: I put this unit in a bathroom I built in my Pole barn. It’s nice and warm in that room now .
customer_reviews.author: SAK

customer_reviews.title: electric heat
customer_reviews.text: Great heaters, i am currently on here to purchase again for another room!
customer_reviews.author: P. Laorenza

customer_reviews.title: knock out comes out hard.
customer_reviews.text: Just put one in. Trouble with the knock out in back for the wires. Basically had to drill it and cut it out with a side cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 stars except one of the five I purchased makes noises.
customer_reviews.author: LJJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Electric Baseboard Heater
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations! Extremely well built and the customer service line was beyond helpful with a question on wiring the thermostat! BRAVO!!
customer_reviews.author: John T. Marquis

customer_reviews.title: easy to install & if we ever need another
customer_reviews.text: Came just as advertised.... easy to install & if we ever need another, this is the place we would get it.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal Moroney

customer_reviews.title: great heaters
customer_reviews.text: I love these new baseboards. We bought an older house with antiquated baseboards, and switched to these hydronic baseboards. The heat is very smooth and comfortable - you can barely tell when they turn on and off. Very even heat in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Seybold

customer_reviews.title: Excellent baseboard heater.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well as a supplemental heat source for a basement family room. Fluid-filled heaters are more efficient than the traditional radiant heaters. It should be installed by a pro because it is 240 v. We gave it a dedicated breaker. We installed a wall-mounted thermostat. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Marasco

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Pretty misleading when the description says 110 v and get into the comments after placing your order only to find it is a 220v and won’t let me cancel my order not even 10 hours later even though it has not shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Fahrenheat PLF Liquid Filled Electric Hydronic Baseboard Heater, 46 inches, Navajo White
product_meta.description: For maximum, steady heat with a gentle and comfortable effect, the 120V Fahrenheat PLF Liquid Filled Electric Hydronic Baseboard Heater is the solution. This hard-wired UL-listed unit uses liquid-element technology, which makes it cool to the touch. This feature makes it an excellent choice to use just about anywhere, since it’s safe for kids and pets. The large element reservoir maximizes volume of heat storage fluid for prolonged comfort while maintaining individual room temperature, so you’re only heating the rooms you want. The linear high-temperature safety cutout automatically shuts off the unit if the air is blocked, and the tip-over switch prevents it from operating if it’s knocked over. The sleek, contemporary design seamlessly blends into most room aesthetics. Thanks to the high-impact Lexan ends and steel body, this heater resists dents, scratches, and rust. Fahrenheat is part of the Marley Engineered Products family, which provides a wide range of innovative, quality engineered, commercial, industrial, and residential electric comfort heaters and ventilation solutions. All our products are engineered with aesthetics, functionality, safety, and structural tolerance in mind.
feature_bullets: USE ANYWHERE DESIGN: This heating unit provides gentle heat with maximum efficiency. Its hydronic design and safety grille means it stays cool to touch while providing unobstructed radiant heat, making it safe to use around small children and pets.
OPTIMAL HEAT: The low-profile design makes it perfect for home use in bedrooms, basements, bathrooms, and living rooms, and perfect for commercial use in waiting rooms, day cares, offices, and more.
EASY TO INSTALL: This unit can mount directly to any wall, and flat on the floor to wood, tile, and even carpet; the trim and low operating temperature allows for carpeting to be installed around it.

SAFE AND EFFICIENT: This energy-efficient design reduces unnecessary on/off cycles, and the overheat protection feature prevents the heater from running when its air intake is blocked, reducing risk of fire.

QUIET AND EFFECTIVE: The convection heater operates without the annoying popping and pinging noise that many other models give off. The fan-less operation keeps dust, allergens, and dander from circulating through the room.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars52 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
